pr_title: iOS - Update date formats and text changes.

replies.bodyText: This is added intentionally to replace it with "on" string.

timeline.bodyText: format is now not consistent with the one above

replies.bodyText: Yes. it's different for each frequency but the same as Android. It was finalized by the BA team and got the approval.

timeline.bodyText:
add a space before a in all format strings.
Remove space before ;, , and add a single space after.
timeline.author: zohrehj

replies.bodyText:
This is the output which is an approved change and already tested by QA.
Adding space will make it inconsistent with Android.
replies.author: tushar-boston
